entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CoreCLR test infra: get rid of spurious warning "Resolved file has a bad image, no metadata, or is otherwise inaccessible" #91564
    9.0.0
  • CoreCLR test infra: improve "Skip" messages for tests blocked in issues.targets #91562
    9.0.0
  • CoreCLR test infra: why does managed test build job build native library components? #91561
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Unnecessary browser and node calls breaking usage in restricted environments #91558
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.CancellationTokenTests.DerivedCancellationTokenSource` fails #91552
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskContinueWhenAnyTests.RunContinueWhenAnyTests` fails #91550
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskPropertiesTests.TaskOptionsTestAsync` fails #91549
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskContinueWhenAllTests` fails #91548
  • [MT][browser] `Sytem.Threading` no exception throws #91547
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Timer` timeout #91545
  • System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.UnProtect error occurring after windows update following previous successful Protect #91544
  • TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose tests fail on Fedora 38 #91543
  • [MT][browser] `System.Transactions`, `System.Threading` timeouts #91541
  • Is there a way to hot reload a particular .wasm module after the runtime already initialised? #91539
  • [MT][browser] `System.Transactions`, `System.Threading` error: Thread failed to start #91538
  • [iOS][tvOS] Building tests fails with "Trimming assemblies requires .NET Core 3.0 or higher" #91535
  • Consider adding an `AggregateBy` method to LINQ #91533
    Future
  • Some System.Reflection.Emit implementations of `Type.IsByRefLike` still throw `NotSupportedException`: "Derived classes must provide an implementation" #91532
  • `volatile.` prefix doesn't work on `ldobj` or `stobj` #91530
  • Unexpected crash in Browser WASM (Possible Stack Corruption) #91528
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ValueTask<TResult, KToken> and IValueTaskSource<out TResult, KToken> #91527

Closed

  • QUIC Listener ConnectionOptionsCallback ALPN Narrowing Down Failure with Wrong Error Code #86701
    9.0.0
  • Update config binding gen nupkg transitive build target to use granular interceptor opt-in #91419
    8.0.0
  • Cross compiling for linux-arm64 produces 32-bit DLL files #91551
  • What do we need to get iterator implementation in `IDictionary`? #91540
  • What changed in .NET 6 that would affect JsonElement Equals behavior? #62585
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add cartesian product/cross join methods to System.Linq #79944
    Future
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-rc.1.23415.7] videoduplicatefinder fail to import Scan Result with System.InvalidOperationException #91048
  • What do we need to get iterator implementation in `IDictionary`? #91529
  • [browser] [wasm] Remove StringContent special case #91379
    9.0.0
  • File does not contain a valid CIL image #91525

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable output compilation validation in binder gen unit tests #91565
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Cleanup native build warnings and unnecessary logos #91563
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Convert all tests under baseservices to the merged test infrastructure #91560
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [release/8.0] Enable interceptors implicitly in binder gen nupkg when generator is enabled #91559
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Fix Interlocked.Or/And for arm64 #91557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Use minipal/random.c for random number generation in the runtime. #91556
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasi] Fix pinvoke support. #91555
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Delete unused methods from CoreCLR PAL #91554
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • ARM64: Use stlur for volatile stores #91553
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Do not trim XUnitWrapperGenerator #91542
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • GC CI test #91537
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] enable all MT library tests on the runtime CI pipeline #91536
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Fix handling ThreadAbortException at the end of catch for LoongArch64. #91531
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

Merged

  • Unsigned check of index inside ElementAt #91522
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Activate Quic Alpn Narrowing Test #91116
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Enable interceptors implicitly in binder gen nupkg when generator is enabled #91469
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [browser] [wasm] remove special StringContent handling #91463
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Implement ThisPtrRetBufPrecode::Init #91451
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Updated

  • Fix NativeAOT unhandled exception stack trace #91415
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix usage of load library #91490
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Implement AppendAllBytes API #90364
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Switch the `AppWithSubDirs` project used for single-file tests to project that is built outside of test runs #91477
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Add DebuggerTypeProxy to ListDictionaryInternal #91355
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [c11] define mono atomics in terms of standard atomics #91489
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add FreeBSD case to gcenv. #91524
    os-freebsd, area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove a little work from CreateManifestAndDescriptors #90435
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Implement Linq CountBy method for IEnumerable and IQueryable #91507
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Reenable C4244 MSVC warning and fix occurrences #91395
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] ELT Profiler Bring-Up #91313
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Making installer tests pass on OSX-arm64 in Release build #91519
    area-Host
  • Fix Dispose and SendData Race on Http3 Test #91291
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement
  • Expand CreateSpan in T0 #91403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [PERF] Remove browser wasm from perf_slow #91429
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Upgrade wasm helix VMs to ubuntu 22.04 #90881
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move GetMethodTable and IsReference to JIT #88860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • DNMD in Mono #91487
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V, LoongArch64] Fix assert(!regArgMaskLive) in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs #91414
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
